item.title: Be My Boss(es)
item.description: Be My Boss(es) is a splash page for my Patreon profile, explaining how I am doing Patreon, and patronage, for anyone who wants to employ me. I built it with Hugo and it's being served up with Netlify – just like this site you're reading this on.
